thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: As Trump Talks Tough on Trade, Worries Mount Over Lack of Action

author: Josh Zumbrun
title: As Trump Talks Tough on Trade, Worries Mount Over Lack of Action

organizations.name: worries mount over lack of action

text:
WASHINGTON—As President Donald Trump considers new tariffs on imported vehicles and pursues a deal with China to avoid a trade war, economists and business leaders see a pattern emerging in the White House’s efforts to renegotiate many trade relationships: Open aggressively, but settle for incremental concessions.
The Trump administration has accused U.S. trading partners of taking advantage of an open U.S. economy. Mr. Trump has demanded partners—China, Mexico, Canada, the EU and others—rewrite trade relationships in ways...
